User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_6_8) AppleWebKit/535.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/13.0.782.99 Safari/535.1 Steps to reproduce: In contentEditable mode. Have enableObjectResizing disabled. Attempted to select an image by clicking or selecting it using the mouse or keyboard. Actual results: In some circumstances selecting an image does not highlight it: * Clicking an image (in all cases). * When the image is in a

by itself - position the cursor before the image, and press SHIFT-right arrow. * When the image is in a

by itself - position the cursor after the image, and press SHIFT-left arrow. * When the image is at start or end of a

the behaviour is similar. In all cases the image is actually selected, as typing or pressing backspace will remove the selected image. In others circumstances it will show selected, or when the selection extends beyond the image to surround elements. Expected results: I'd expect the behaviour to be consistent in all circumstances - the image should be highlighted in each case.
